name_panel.style: border-radius:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.5);border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);box-shadow: 0px 4px 14px rgba(0,0,0,.15);

dialogs.text: I hadn't heard from Mark in four months since the graduation, he was one of my closest friends in school. Out of nowhere, he sends this invitation to his family's house... why now?
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: Hey dude! You actually made it! I honestly thought youâ€™d bailed when you didn't text back an hour ago.
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: Look at you. You look good, Sam. Seriously. Adult life treated you better than it did me.
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: I surely do not miss the dorm food and three hours of sleep, anyway.
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: True. Though to be fair it wasn't just exams that kept us up late, sometime it was just partying, i for one do miss the parties.
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: Alright buddy come on in, let's get some drinks in the kitchen
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: I'll head over to the kitchen and get us some drinks, hang tight man
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: don't spike my drink dude !
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: it only took peer pressure in a frat party for you to suck me off so why would i drug you
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: Oh fuck off that's not happening again unless you're a millionaire
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: God, this place is obscene. We used to fight over who got the desk chair, and now heâ€™s got a living room  that probably costs more than my tuition.
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: I have a feeling he didn't invite me here to just "watch a movie"
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: He helped me cheat in the exams, invited me to cool parties and event introduced me to his rich friends,honestly i wouldn't even mind it if he wants to be friends with benefits. let's see how it goes .
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: it's been a minute since we hung out and had some drinks, so how is the job search going ?
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: It's as bad as you'd expect, I've sent like a million resumes and I'm pretty sure they all just go straight into a void.
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: And you, how's the crypto trading going ? are you a millionaire yet ?
dialogs.name: Marc

dialogs.text: sensing sarcasm there, i would have you know that it's been going pretty great
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: i mean i don't even have to work a single day and i make hundreds of thousands a month, what more can a young man ask for.
dialogs.name: Narrator

dialogs.text: that's awesome dude I'm happy for you !
Sam and Marc spend the next few hours catching up
dialogs.name: Narrator
